fr.ujm.tse.lt2c.satin.buffer

Class TripleBufferLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ujm.tse.lt2c.satin.buffer.TripleBufferLock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TripleBuffer

    public class TripleBufferLock
extends java.lang.Object
implements TripleBuffer
    Triple Buffer managing concurrency. New triples gone in the main buffer until it's full, then the buffers are switched and the fullbuffer event is thrown.
    Author:
    Jules Chevalier
    See Also:
    TripleBuffer
